Test Name: Protein S Deficiency (PROS1 Gene) by Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To detect pathogenic mutations in the PROS1 gene associated with hereditary Protein S Deficiency for clinical diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Labeled microcentrifuge tube containing purified genomic DNA
Equipment: Next-Generation sequencer, spectrophotometer, gel electrophoresis apparatus, magnetic-bead purification system, bioanalyzer
